segment.source: How to install the Internet Explorer 11 update using your network
segment.target: How to install the Internet Explorer 11 update using your network

segment.source: Install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) using your network (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) using your network (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) using your network
segment.target: Install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) using your network

segment.source: You can install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) over your network by putting your custom IE11 installation package in a shared network folder and letting your employees run the Setup program on their own computers.
segment.target: You can install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) over your network by putting your custom IE11 installation package in a shared network folder and letting your employees run the Setup program on their own computers.

segment.source: You can create the network folder structure manually, or you can run Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11).
segment.target: You can create the network folder structure manually, or you can run Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11).

segment.source: If you support multiple architectures and operating systems, create a subfolder for each combination.
segment.target: If you support multiple architectures and operating systems, create a subfolder for each combination.

segment.source: If you support multiple languages, create a subfolder for each localized installation file.
segment.target: If you support multiple languages, create a subfolder for each localized installation file.

segment.source: To manually create the folder structure
segment.target: To manually create the folder structure

segment.source: Copy your custom IE11 installation file into a folder on your network, making sure it's available to your employees.
segment.target: Copy your custom IE11 installation file into a folder on your network, making sure it's available to your employees.

segment.source: To create the folder structure using IEAK 11
segment.target: To create the folder structure using IEAK 11

segment.source: Run the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 in IEAK 11, using the Full Installation Package option.
segment.target: Run the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 in IEAK 11, using the Full Installation Package option.

segment.source: The wizard automatically puts your custom installation files in your folder.
segment.target: The wizard automatically puts your custom installation files in your folder.

segment.source: Where the is the location of your other build files.
segment.target: Where the is the location of your other build files.

segment.source: Use the localized versions of the IE Customization Wizard 11 to create localized IE11 installation packages.
segment.target: Use the localized versions of the IE Customization Wizard 11 to create localized IE11 installation packages.

segment.source: Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) - Administration Guide for IT Pros
segment.target: Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) - Administration Guide for IT Pros
